content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available for insertion before attempting to insert items. Check if the furnace is already occupied or if it has enough space for the items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has produced enough items. Check the production status of the furnace before extraction.

### Errors when using inventory
- Regularly check your inventory to avoid confusion about available resources. This will help in managing resources effectively and prevent unnecessary harvesting or crafting.
